          English Language Circle
         
 Learning a new language and want to get more practice speaking the language? Develop your language skills through informal conversations with native speakers! 
 Join us on Thursdays to practice speaking English. For the Spring quarter our Language Circles meet weekly via Google Meet.  
 
 English:  Thursdays at 1:10 -2pm                      

 
 Access Code: englishlanguagetable 
 
 
 
   
 Other Languages offered this quarter include:  
 
 French:   Mondays at 11:10am - 12pm              

 
 Access Code: frenchlanguagetable 
 
 
 Korean:  Tuesdays at 2:10 - 3pm                                 
 
 Access Code: koreanlanguagetable 
 
 
 Japanese:  Tuesdays at 2:10 - 3pm                             
 
 Access Code: japaneselanguagetable 
 
 
 Chinese:   Tuesdays at 3:10 - 4pm                                 
 
 Access Code: chineselanguagetable 
 
 
 Spanish : Thursdays at 11:10am - 12pm           
 
 Access Code: spanishlanguagetable 
 
 
 
   
 Where:   meet.google.com      
 
 Instructions how to join google meet:  here 
 
 
 
 
  Friday, June 11 at 1:10pm
